text: Allah ne wada farmaya hai tum mein se un logon ke saath jo iman layein aur neik amal karein ke woh unko usi tarah zameen mein khalifa banayega jis tarah unse pehle guzre huey logon ko bana chuka hai , unke liye unke us deen (religion) ko mazboot buniyadon par qayam kardega jisey Allah taala ne unke haqq mein pasand kiya hai, aur unki (maujooda) halat e khauf ko aman se badal dega, bas woh meri bandagi karein aur mere saath kisi ko shareek na karein, aur jo iske baad kufr karey to aise hi log faasiq hain
